snippet: As a general strike entered a second day on Monday, the police said they had filed charges against 44 opposition activists after scattered violence and vandalism erupted in Dhaka, the capital, on Sunday.
abstract: Violence and vandalism erupts in Dhaka, Bangladesh, where activists call strike to protest the disappearance of opposition official Elias Ali.
lead_paragraph: As a general strike entered a second day on Monday, the police said they had filed charges against 44 opposition activists after scattered violence and vandalism erupted in Dhaka, the capital, on Sunday.

headline.main: Bangladesh: Opposition Activists Charged as Strike Turns Violent
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Opposition Activists Charged as Strike Turns Violent
